mapper.select: select category_id categoryId, NAME categoryName from category where parent_id is null

select count(category_id) from category where 1=1
and parent_id = #{parentId}
and parent_id is not null
and name like '%'|| #{categoryName} || '%'

select category_id categoryId, member_id memberId, name categoryName, parent_id parentId, case when parent_id = 1 then '음료' when parent_id = 2 then '식품' when parent_id = 3 then '상품' end as parentName from category where category_id = #{categoryId}
mapper.update: merge into category cate using dual on (cate.category_id = ${categoryId}) when matched then update set name = #{categoryName}, parent_id = #{parentId} when not matched then insert (cate.category_id, cate.name, cate.member_id, parent_id) values (category_seq.nextval,#{categoryName}, #{memberId}, #{parentId})
